mapper.insert: insert into Employee_t (EmployeeNum, EmployeeName, EmployeeSex, EmployeeBirth, Photo, EmployeeIDNum, EmployeeTel, InstitutionNum, CurrentWorkNum, WorkStyleNum, WorkPositionNum, InStationDate, OutStationDate, WorkType, HomeAddress, JoinCompanyDate, OutCompanyDate, OnState, OutCompanyOrNot, InsuranceNum, InsuredTime, EmployeeID, IsRetire, RetireTime ) values (#{employeeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{employeeSex,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{employeeBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeTel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{institutionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentWorkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workStyleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workPositionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inStationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outStationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinCompanyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outCompanyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{onState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{outCompanyOrNot,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{employeeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRetire,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{retireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update Employee_t
EmployeeName = #{employeeName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EmployeeSex = #{employeeSex,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EmployeeBirth = #{employeeBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EmployeeIDNum = #{employeeIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EmployeeTel = #{employeeTel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
InstitutionNum = #{institutionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CurrentWorkNum = #{currentWorkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WorkStyleNum = #{workStyleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WorkPositionNum = #{workPositionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
InStationDate = #{inStationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OutStationDate = #{outStationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WorkType = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HomeAddress = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JoinCompanyDate = #{joinCompanyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OutCompanyDate = #{outCompanyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OnState = #{onState,jdbcType=CHAR},
OutCompanyOrNot = #{outCompanyOrNot,jdbcType=CHAR},
InsuranceNum = #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
InsuredTime = #{insuredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EmployeeID = #{employeeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsRetire = #{isRetire,jdbcType=CHAR},
RetireTime = #{retireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where EmployeeNum = #{employeeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Employee_t set EmployeeName = #{employeeName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, EmployeeSex = #{employeeSex,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, EmployeeBirth = #{employeeBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeIDNum = #{employeeIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeTel = #{employeeTel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, InstitutionNum = #{institutionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CurrentWorkNum = #{currentWorkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WorkStyleNum = #{workStyleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WorkPositionNum = #{workPositionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, InStationDate = #{inStationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OutStationDate = #{outStationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WorkType = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HomeAddress = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JoinCompanyDate = #{joinCompanyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OutCompanyDate = #{outCompanyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OnState = #{onState,jdbcType=CHAR}, OutCompanyOrNot = #{outCompanyOrNot,jdbcType=CHAR}, InsuranceNum = #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InsuredTime = #{insuredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EmployeeID = #{employeeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsRetire = #{isRetire,jdbcType=CHAR}, RetireTime = #{retireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where EmployeeNum = #{employeeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EmployeeName,EmployeeNum from Employee_t where OutCompanyOrNot !='1';
select EmployeeName from Employee_t where EmployeeNum in ${condition};

select EmployeeNum,EmployeeName+'-'+EmployeeID as EmployeeMark from employee_institution_datadictionaryView where (InstitutionNum=#{institution_num} or InstitutionPrefix=#{institution_num}) and OutCompanyOrNot !='1'
select EmployeeNum,EmployeeName from Employee_t where EmployeeID = #{employee_id}
